mapper.select: select count(*) from workspace where w_teamname = #{w_teamname}
mapper.insert: insert into workspace(w_owner, w_teamname, w_title, w_information, w_logo) values(#{w_owner}, #{w_teamname}, #{w_title}, #{w_information}, #{w_logo})
insert into workspace_hobby(w_no, h_no) values( (select w_no from workspace where w_teamname = #{w_teamname}), #{w_hobby})
